definition: disciple/apprentice/believer/on foot/bare or empty/to no avail/only/prison sentence

sentences.chinese: 她还跟那个异教徒一起么？

sentences.english: But this girl was a non-believer.
sentences.chinese: 况且，这个女子是一个异教徒。

sentences.english: He was a pagan … who worshiped idols .
sentences.chinese: 他以前是个拜偶像的异教徒。

sentences.english: He was declared a heretic, and excommunicated from the Church.
sentences.chinese: 他被宣布为异教徒，并被驱逐出教会。

sentences.english: The two heretics were burned at the stake.
sentences.chinese: 两名异教徒被捆在木桩上烧死了。

sentences.english: His commission was to convert the local heathens to Christianity.
sentences.chinese: 他的使命就是使当地的异教徒改信基督教。

sentences.english: What follows is an abstract of the Summa contra Gentiles.
sentences.chinese: 以下是《异教徒驳议辑要》的一个摘要。

sentences.english: In fact, Easter was originally a pagan festival .
sentences.chinese: 而事实上，最初的复活节是异教徒的节日。

sentences.english: Dymphna was a virgin daughter of a pagan king.
sentences.chinese: 邓娜是一位异教徒国王的女儿，并且还是处子之身。

sentences.english: To not do so was almost heresy.
sentences.chinese: 不这样做的话，就是异教徒。

sentences.english: So what keeps heretics from interpreting this text in false ways?
sentences.chinese: 那是什么阻止了异教徒用错误的方式解读经文呢？

sentences.english: Such an error belongs to the pagans and the Arians.
sentences.chinese: 这样的错误只属于异教徒和亚流党。

sentences.english: The heathens know not God, and love the world only.
sentences.chinese: 异教徒不认识上帝，他们只爱尘世。

sentences.english: In fact, Easter was originally a pagan festival.
sentences.chinese: 而事实上，最初的复活节是异教徒的节日。

sentences.english: Those who reject the laws of the Maker and the words of His prophet are apostate .
sentences.chinese: 那些违背了造物主和他的先知的话语的人是异教徒。

definition: the Papacy/the Vatican/the Church government/Holy See
